column1: This is the way the Maximum Entropy tagger CITATION runs if one uses the binary version from the website (see the comparison in Section 5)
We have chosen the Maximum Entropy tagger CITATION for a comparison with our universal tagger
column2: since it achieved (by a small margin) the best overall result on Slovene as reported there (86.360% on all tokens) of taggers available to us (MBT
column4: was not freely available to us at the time of writing)

column1: English 9.18% Czech 18.83% Estonian 13.95% Hungarian 8.16% Romanian 7.76% Slovene 16.26% MaxEnt 6.38% 17.77% 14.92% 8.55% 7.66% 17.44% 4.3 Tagger Comparison The work CITATION consistently compares several taggers (HMM
column4: and the Daelemans et al.\'s Memory-based Tagger) on Slovene
